name: 3 words
description:
The game lets you experience a day in a life after finding out war broke out in a neighbouring country. Learn about misinformation, have a difficult conversation with parents, and come to terms with your own feelings about the situation. The game was made to help people process a situation as mentally difficult as war.

This educational game was created during the Game Jam for Ukraine event (4-6 March 2022) for the Play for Ukraine Initiative. 

3 slová sú hrateľné aj v slovenčine.
